description: OpenStack cluster runtime metrics by OpenNext SAS

targets.query: select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from "openstack_check_apis_value" where "instance" =~ /^$api_endpoint$/ and $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_running_instances' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size_value" WHERE "instance" = 'volumes_size' AND "type_instance" = 'available' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size_value" WHERE "instance" = 'volumes_size' AND "type_instance" = 'in-use' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_free_disk' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_used_disk' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_used_ram' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_free_ram' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_tenants_value" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_roles_value" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_users_value" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_free_vcpus' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_used_vcpus' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "value" FROM "openstack_nova_service_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_nova_services_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_nova_instances_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)

panels.description: Aggregated size of volumes by state

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size_value" WHERE "instance" = 'volumes_size' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)

panels.title: Global Volumes Statistics

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "value" FROM "openstack_cinder_service_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "value" FROM "openstack_cinder_services_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "type_instance" fill(null)

panels.description: Aggregated size of snapshots by state

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots_size_value" WHERE "instance" = 'snapshots_size' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(null)

panels.title: Global Snapshots statistics

panels.description: Number of images by visibility and state

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_glance_images_value" WHERE "instance" = 'public' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_glance_images_value" WHERE "instance" = 'private' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_glance_images_value" WHERE "instance" = 'shared' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_glance_images_value" WHERE "instance" = 'community' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
